name: Meklord Emperor Granel
effectText: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by its own effect. When a face-up monster you control is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card. This card gains ATK/DEF equal to half your LP and ATK equal to the combined ATK of the monsters equipped to it by this effect. You can target 1 of these equipped monsters; Special Summon that target to your field in Defense Position.
